issue.title: Initialize data members of ranges and their iterators

discussion.p: Before P1035 was accepted, no data member in [ranges] whose type could potentially be an aggregate or fundamental type was left without initializer. P1035 left some such data members without initializer, so it is possible to have them have indeterminate values. We propose restoring consistency.
discussion.note: 2020-01-14 Status set to Tentatively Ready after five positive votes on the reflector.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4842.
